fields.description:
*Description:*
I have a map with custom view. When I try to zoom in/out the map, some of the map annotation disappears. This happens on iOS 9.3. It works as expected on iOS 9.2.

*Environment:*
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 5.2.2
Mac OS X Version                     = 10.11
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 0.12.7
  npm Version                   = 2.11.3

Appcelerator CLI
  Installer                         = 4.2.4
  Core Package                = 5.2.2

Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                      = 5.0.6
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.31

Titanium SDKs Version      = 5.2.2
iOS version: 9.3
Physical device: iPad

*Test Case:*
Test case attached with this ticket

*Reproduction:*
1. Create an alloy project with the attached test case
2. Run on device
3. Zoom in and out the map several times

*Actual:* Some of the map annotation disappears
*Expected:* Map annotations should always be visible
fields.summary: iOS 9.3 - Some of the map annotation disappears with customView

comments.body: Resolving as duplicate of MOD-2201, please follow that one, thx!
Closing as a duplicate. If this is in error, please reopen.
